name: @fabric-msft/svg-icons
author: dcsuxefabux@microsoft.com
description: A publicly available collection of SVG icons for use in Microsoft Fabric platform extension development.

scripts.dev-generate-components:
echo 'Generating React components... 
'; rimraf build/components ; npx @svgr/cli --typescript --out-dir build/components src/svg
scripts.dev-compile:
echo 'Compiling... 
'; rimraf build/esm ; rimraf build/dts ; tsc --project tsconfig.build.json --outDir build/esm
scripts.optimize-src-svg:
echo 'Optimizing all files in src/svg... 
'; svgo src/svg --config=svgo.config.js --recursive
scripts.build-library: yarn dev-generate-components && yarn dev-compile && yarn dev-bundle
scripts.update-library: yarn dev-optimize-svg && yarn build-library && yarn cleanup
